parameters.content:
## üß™ TEST BEFORE DEPLOYING
1. Send test email
2. Check Sheets output
3. Verify summary quality
4. Adjust filters/prompt as needed

parameters.text: =Please read this email "{{ $json.Content }}" and provide a very short, concise summary containing only the most important information. Keep the summary as brief as possible without losing essential details.

parameters.content:
## ‚öôÔ∏è Step 3: Sender Filter
‚Ä¢ Replace 'YOUR_SENDER_NAME_FILTER'
‚Ä¢ Only emails from this sender will proceed
‚Ä¢ Supports multiple conditions

## ‚úçÔ∏è Step 4: Customize AI Prompt
‚Ä¢ Default: Short email summary
‚Ä¢ Change tone/formality as needed

## ü§ñ Step 5: AI Configuration
1. Add Groq API key
2. Or replace with other AI model

## üìä Step 6: Google Sheets Setup
1. Add Google credentials
2. Paste Sheet URL
3. Select target sheet
4. Columns auto-map to email data

## ‚úÖ Expected Output Format
Columns: Sender | Date | Email | Subject | Summary
